QAPair.Question: Do you have information about Home health care
QAPair.Answer: You are likely excited about going home after being in the hospital, skilled nursing center, or rehabilitation facility. You should probably be able to go home once you are able to: Get into and out of a chair or bed without much help, Walk around with your cane, crutches, or walker, Walk between your bedroom, bathroom, and kitchen, Go up and down stairs ,
